root.message: The DISAGGREGATION field for indicator 3-8-2, translated into en
root.data:
## Disaggregation
The following disaggregation is possible in so far as the survey has been designed to provide representative estimates at such level: * Gender and age of the head of the household * Geographic location (rural/urban) * Quintiles of the household welfare measures (total household expenditure or income). See comments and limitations for the sensitivity of the disaggregation to the choice of the welfare measure.
